Articles.Content:
Hey gang! Obviously from the title, I play Rust, and so do my friends. One of these friends (actually two of them) owns his own server and we'd really like it if more people came on. So far, there is only about 5 people who play actively, but we'd like more than that.

The server has several mods, like an economy mod, and other stuff. I'm really tired right now.

If you'd like to join, include your Steam username and we'll get you on ASAP!
What kind of players are you? Cooperative or competitive?

I do have Steam access to Rust, but I haven't touched it in a while. Waiting for the game to turn into something more than a trollfest. And C4 was the A-Bomb of Rust last I checked, with the capacity to eliminate countless hours of work in a couple of seconds.

The server is openly PVP and modded, raiding is allowed. Me and my friends are cooperative unless you cross us... >

Also, the Charges have been nerfed from "A-bombs". You'd need quite a few to break into my setup.
I'm thinking about it. I've only watched gameplay videos of Rust so far. I was interested, but never bought it because of the same stuff vger said. Private servers sound like a good solution.

I've seen this in similar topics before. You (not you personally, just people like you) invite people to join them in a game, but you don't supply ANY further information.

In this case, I've never heard of 'Rust' before. All I know from the first post is that it's an online miultiplayer game called Rust. That's it. Is it really that hard to add some more information, some screenshots perhaps? Or a few links? If you want people to get interested you need to sell your idea, show them what it is and and get them interested.

Maximus did you get my pm?

Yep

I've seen this in similar topics before. You (not you personally, just people like you) invite people to join them in a game, but you don't supply ANY further information.

In this case, I've never heard of 'Rust' before. All I know from the first post is that it's an online miultiplayer game called Rust. That's it. Is it really that hard to add some more information, some screenshots perhaps? Or a few links? If you want people to get interested you need to sell your idea, show them what it is and and get them interested.

Ah, but if you haven't played/heard of Rust before, then why did you answer the recruitment summons? I'm looking for people who play Rust, or who are getting the game very shortly, to help them learn the ropes.
Is the server whitelisted ? If not what's the ip?

Nope, no whitelist. Everybody can join!

I have only played on the official servers long enough to make a hatchet, which took longer than you think because of how overfarmed the resources are on those servers.

Then I got mauled to death by a pack of wolves. Its ok though because I was starving to death.

So if you don't mind someone who sucks, I'd be happy to try logging on and see if I fare better.
Oh yeah. We'll be taking newbies as well, we're just trying to build up a happy little community. PM me your Steam username, and we can talk from there.
